name: Darkstar - Disney+ Hotstar Dark Theme
description:
Based on https://userstyles.org/users/815512

Dark Hotstar Theme

Features:
- Full Black Theme
- No hotstar watermark in videos
- Works on mobile view
- Dark scrollbars
- No facebook like button under the videos

Thanks to Pravin Juge ( https://userstyles.org/users/815512 ) , i just changed the new Logo , That's about it
